price: 97. Net jei kiekvienas ženklas ateitų pas juos, iki tol, kol jie pamatys skausmingą kančią.
arabic: وَلَوۡ جَآءَتۡهُمۡ كُلُّ ءَايَةٍ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُاْ ٱلۡعَذَابَ ٱلۡأَلِيمَ

version.title: Lithuanian Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Lithuanian By Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: walaw jāathum kullu āyatin ḥattā yarawū al-ʿadhāba al-alīma
